item.title: Certifications
item.description: In here you can see all the certificates I’ve earned soo far! Hopefully there are more coming soon… API Penetration Testing

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: You can reach me via: Email either at Gmail or Proton. Collaboration platforms such as Discord or Element. LinkedIn if you want to keep it “businessy”. Or send a message bellow ! Contact form Link to heading Although the form is from an external service, you can still consult this site’s Privacy Policy. Full Name Email Address Message

item.title: Projects
item.description: Personal Link to heading These are some of the projects I’ve worked on my spare time, they are also the ones I had the most fun developing. EPHScores Link to heading An application for medical emergency first responders in Portugal. It provides an easy way to calculate various scores and evaluations of the patient, soo to ease and accelerate the help and care. Play Store SensorMesh Link to heading SensorMesh allows you to direct output from serial devices and internal services into a distributed peer-to-peer database on IPFS.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Highly motivated and obsessively focused, I guess, is the best way to describe me. I commit myself entirely to every single project I work on because, for me, software development is more than just my job; it is also my hobby and my passion. My main fields of interest are networking, web3 technologies, and cybersecurity. I’ve been programming since I was 15, and from that point onward, I knew that technology was my vocation.
